## MessageChain class

Message chain is a data structure which is based on doubly linked list extending it with abilities to consume another chains of any sizes and updates existing items, methods for dynamically loading it parts, syncing, controlling length and managing shifted nodes which is viable for building messaging feed

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class MessageChain<ChainId, ChainValue extends MessageChainValue<ChainId>> extends DoublyLinkedList<ChainId, ChainValue, MessageChainElement<ChainId, ChainValue>> 
```

|  [setLimit(newLimit)](./structures.messagechain.setlimit.md) |  | Set maximum amount of items which current chain can contain |
